Where do i put the SD data?

@kracan8

 Instructions: (For Xperia Devices)

    Install APK
    Copy SD files to 'sdcard/Android/data/' 
    Launch the Game

Instructions: (For Non-Xperia Devices)

    Install APK
    Copy SD files to 'sdcard/Android/data/'
    Install Chainfire3D Download Chainfire3D
    Open Chainfire3D & install 'CF3D driver' > Reboot
    Copy 'libGLEMU_QUALCOMM.zip' to sd card Download QUALCOMM
    Open Chainfire3D & install 'QUALCOMM' plugin
    Go to 'Default OpenGL settings' > Tap Use plugin & select 'QUALCOMM' > Check 'Hide CF3D ID'
    Launch the Game
Thank you, its working now:)
